problem_names:
theorem (in group) unit_group_unique:
  assumes "card (carrier G) = 1"
  shows "\<exists> h. h \<in> iso G unit_group"
translations:
theorem (in group) unit_group_unique:
  assumes "card (carrier G) = 1"
  shows "\<exists> h. h \<in> iso G unit_group"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>h. h \<in> Group.iso G unit_group

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>h. h \<in> Group.iso G unit_group

using this:
  card (carrier G) = 1

goal (1 subgoal):

    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  carrier G = {x}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>h. h \<in> Group.iso G unit_group
by -(rule group_isoI, auto simp add:unit_group_is_group is_group, simp add:unit_group_def)
